definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: flint;—[[חַלָּמִישׁ]] De 8:15 + 3 t.; cstr. [[חַלְמִישׁ]] De 32:13; —flint ´[[חוּר הַח]] rock of flint = flinty rock, whence water flowed for Isr. in desert De 8:15, and (no [[חור]]) Ps 114:8; worked by miners Job 28:9; hyperb. oil out of [[חוּר]] ´[[ח]] De 32:13 flint of rock = rocky flint (poet.);—in sim. of firmness [[עַל־כֵּן שַׂמְתִּי פָּנַי כַּחַלָּמִישׁ]] Is 50:7.
